summary:
Expertise > 28 years in Unilever Foods Global - Process Systems Engineering - Process Automation & Control - Process Science - Food Process Design - Process Optimization - Process Debottlenecking - Process Dynamics - Process Sensors - Plantwide Control.

Able to roll-out technical- and scientific innovations by real world technical implementations. Solving practical business problems and creating value.

• Invented and implemented a disruptive unit-operation, leading to a sustainable, food waste reducing process. Indonesia. Savings around 750 kE/year.
• Delivered in-line monitoring tools (smart sensors) for real time cook-time- and color control in sweet soy sauce processing.
• Delivered working process plants for liquid tea across Italy and Kenya.
• Dairy process optimization for ice-cream.
• Developed and implemented a real-time yield monitoring technology for a soy protein extraction  process. Reducing raw materials consumption by 10%. Argentina.
• Delivered thermal integration model (TIM) results to a real world application in a tomato sauce process. Costa Rica.
• Delivered 20% capacity increase in a tomato paste concentration process by debottlenecking and introducing plant-wide control. Greece.

profile_positions.description:
Worked on many different projects for the food and beverages categories Unilever operates in. Activities included process (re)design and process control systems design. In my current project in this position I am working on an innovative extrusion process. Process sensors, process control.

Successful projects in tea, cheese, tomato paste, margarine, soy-milk, ice-cream, dressings, sauces + many more

INNOVATIVE FOOD PRODUCTS AND PROCESS DEVELOPMENT

From idea stage to proof of principle. New process design and scoping by conducting bench scale and pilot plant experiments and analysis. Process control strategy design.
Detailed process design - including heat- and mass transfer details of each stream, equipment- and line sizing, utility design. Sensors and actuators. Data-acquisition and analysis. Yield calculations. Installation, commissioning and optimization of pilot plants and commercial scale plants. Conceptual design of new processes.

SCALE-UP TO COMMERCIAL LEVEL

Basic and detailed engineering of commercial scale production plants - e.g. heat- and material balances, PFD, P&ID verification, equipment sizing and data sheet verification for innovation processes. Assisting project lead in preparing technology brief and CAPEX proposals. Contractor identification and selection on basis of cost, quality and expertise level. Playing a lead role in design, installation and commissioning.

OPTIMIZATION OF EXISTING PROCESSES

Optimization techniques to reduce conversion cost, increase yield, capacity and quality of existing processes. Process Intensification. Debottlenecking. Reducing raw materials consumption - increasing sustainability.
